turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Meinong Lake.
turn.1: What is known about the lake in the first part of the song?
turn.2: Meinong Lake The Meinong Lake () is a lake and reservoir in Meinong District, Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: The lake was originally named as Jhongjun Pi or Minong Lake.
turn.6: In 1956, the lake was renamed to Zhongzheng Lake since the visit of Chiang Kai-shek, and in August 2016, the lake was renamed to Meinong Lake.
turn.7: What is the size of the lake?
turn.8: Covers an area of 21 hectares, it is the second largest artificial lake in Kaohsiung.
turn.10: It has a capacity to store water for irrigation of over 130 hectares of farmland.
turn.11: Is there anything else known about the lake?
turn.12: It also serves as a fishery.
